member.name: T:MavLink.FrameworkBitConverter
member.summary: converter from byte[] => primitive CLR types delegates to the .Net framework bitconverter for speed, and to avoid using unsafe pointer casting for Silverlight.

member.name: T:MavLink.Mavlink
member.summary: Mavlink communication class.
member.remarks: Keeps track of state across send and receive of packets. User of this class can just send Mavlink Messsages, and receive them by feeding this class bytes off the wire as they arrive

member.name: M:MavLink.Mavlink.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new MavlinkLink Object

member.name: M:MavLink.Mavlink.ParseBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Process latest bytes from the stream. Received packets will be raised in the event

member.name: E:MavLink.Mavlink.PacketReceived
member.summary: Event raised when a message is decoded successfully

member.name: P:MavLink.Mavlink.PacketsReceived
member.summary: Total number of packets successfully received so far

member.name: P:MavLink.Mavlink.BadCrcPacketsReceived
member.summary: Total number of packets which have been rejected due to a failed crc

member.name: E:MavLink.Mavlink.PacketFailedCRC
member.summary: Raised when a packet does not pass CRC

member.name: E:MavLink.Mavlink.BytesUnused
member.summary: Raised when a number of bytes are passed over and cannot be used to decode a packet

member.name: T:MavLink.PacketCRCFailEventArgs
member.summary: Describes an occurance when a packet fails CRC

member.name: F:MavLink.PacketCRCFailEventArgs.BadPacket
member.summary: The bytes that filed the CRC, including the starting character

member.name: F:MavLink.PacketCRCFailEventArgs.Offset
member.summary: The offset in bytes where the start of the block begins, e.g 50 would mean the block of badbytes would start 50 bytes ago in the stread. No negative sign is necessary

member.name: T:MavLink.PacketCRCFailEventHandler
member.summary: Handler for an PacketFailedCRC Event
